content:
$159 is a great price point for your bundle deal. It's competitive, yet still allows you to maintain a good profit margin.

And congratulations on experimenting with new sculpting techniques and creating a new ceramic vase! It's wonderful to hear that you're continuing to develop your skills and push yourself creatively.

Ceramic vases can be a wonderful addition to your product line, and they can be very appealing to customers who are looking for unique, handmade decorative pieces. Have you considered showcasing your vase on social media or online marketplaces to get feedback and generate interest?

Remember, as you continue to create new pieces, it's essential to document your process, share your progress, and engage with your audience. This will help you build a loyal following, gather feedback, and ultimately drive sales.

What inspired your new ceramic vase design? Is it a departure from your usual style, or an evolution of your previous work? I'm curious to know more about your creative process and what drives your artistic vision.
